title: Microsoft MCSE, MCSA, MCSD 將於2020年7月1日開始退役，以Azure為主的考試代替

replies.msg:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/learning/community-blog-post.aspx?BlogId=8&Id=375282

MCSA, MCSD, MCSE certifications retire; with continued investment to role-based certifications

Microsoft’s focus on role-based training and certifications can help you develop necessary skills and experience to advance in an accelerated and increasingly competitive cloud-based world. Role-based training and certifications are kept current with new features and services that Microsoft is constantly adding to the cloud solution areas, minimizing skill gaps associated with the applicable job roles.

Since we announced our focus on role-based training and certifications in September 2018, we’ve added a total of 34 certifications to our portfolio across Azure, Modern Workplace, and Business Applications. As we continue to expand on role-based learning offerings, all remaining exams associated with Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA), Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer (MCSD), Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert (MCSE) will retire on June 30, 2020.

If you’re working towards a MCSA, MCSD, or MCSE certification, you’ll want to pass all required exams before they retire. The list below shows existing exams that will retire. Note that training content may continue to be available in these areas even after the exams have retired.

If you currently hold a MCSA, MCSD, or MCSE certification, why not update your profile with one of our new role-based certifications that may be relevant to you. Check out our recommended role-based certifications:

https://www.zdnet.com/article/microsoft-is-retiring-its-mcsa-mcsd-and-mcse-certifications-in-june-2020/

Microsoft is retiring three of its more popular professional certification categories as part of a move toward "role-based training." Its Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA), Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer (MCSD) and Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert (MCSE) certifications are going away, officials said via a blog post on February 28, 2020. Microsoft also has no plans to offer Windows Server 2019 or SQL Server 2019 certifications, officials said.
係microsoft將業務重心放晒上cloud，向 azure傾斜，好似想放棄傳統的windows server 甚至係desktop windows市場咁。

我是做了 IT 行業已經第 14 個年頭, 都快 35歲了, 我有 CS Degree, 已outdate的 .NET 2.0的MCAD, MCSA for Server 2003.但我未想比長江後浪走, 最近考了OCP for Java, PMP, 原本打算找一份Manager級的工作, 叫價28K.
但找了個多月都沒有回音, 最後唯有找一份次等的SA工作…都有26K, 生活還算有一個保障.

今天第一日上班, 報到時, HR的妹妹叫我去房坐, 影印我的學歷証明. (對, 是上班第一天才影印…)
我由手提包拿出一堆曾經令我引以為傲的証書.
HR妹妹一張一張地看…見到我的會考成績單, 彷如發現新大陸…
我在想: (妹妹, 你係咪上年岩岩DSE畢業?)
之後再一張一張睇,見到我的outdate MCAD,MCSA, 她提起她的小手, 放在另一個位置.
Fine, 意料中事.
到PMP那張, 她問我: (呢張係咩黎?)
我答佢:( ….Project….嗯….PMP…)
之後佢用同一手勢，放在一邊, 連帶話: ( 呢o的唔需要喇)
呢一刻我深深覺得, IT的專業為何物,

她帶我去我的坐位, 是一個沒有partition, 有如自修室, 跟其他人面對面的工作台.
台上有一部15吋的Dell Mon, 感覺彷如隔世…回到2000年用Windows 98的感覺.
但keyboard跟mouse是filand牌子,在黃金商場賣$40一Set那種.
而且不是全新, 那隻Mouse的Scroll, 用手指滑動的時候, 有如一隻倉鼠玩的轉盤在海中心飄浮的感覺.
Keyboard上, 暗裡藏有不少薯片餅乾碎.
整套電腦似是由仁愛堂等福利部門捐贈出來的.

但順行開機, 進入令人懷念的Window XP, 這個時候,我才明白其實Windows 8.1都不錯.
但…What? 右下角打個大交差, 沒有網絡連線?
問問那位Support大哥, 他說公司是行DHCP,不用set IP的.
那我檢查一下Lan線什麼, 完全沒有問題.
如是者, 我9:30開始, 捐台底, 又捐返上來試試load網頁,ping下gateway ,玩足半個鐘.
Support大哥終於肯放下佢部iphone, 幫我睇睇.

最後佢話條Lan線,夾左什麼Cross cable什麼什麼, 我network方面真係唔熟, 因為Lan線我都是$20一條買的.
什麼RJ45,自己夾頭, 從未需要我做過.

上到網, 開始download Visual Studio express版的ISO.
執執個windows, 較返輸入法,安返7zip, notepad++等等, 大家都應該明我講乜.
兵荒馬亂之際 , Programmer大哥問我:( 呀俊(偽名) 你settle好喇可?)
我望望個VS ISO download進度…33%, 124KB/s , 剩餘時間 54分鐘…
我答佢: (….嗯…差唔多…)

呢個時候Programmer大哥話 🙁 拿, 我俾個project你睇住先…你去share drive…. XXXXXX)
佢再問: ( 你有冇用過node.js ?)
我: ( 冇 )
佢: (咁呀,, 你睇住document先, 你上search “node.js document” )
佢仲要一隻一隻英文字讀出黎, 驚我唔識串”document”….咁我照住佢打…..
呢個時候..佢突然..
佢: ( 呀….俊 , 你俾隻mouse我)
咁我俾佢, 以為有咩野要搞.
佢熄左我個IE9 , 起start menu開chrome, 重新search一次…
佢話: ( IE9 好多野唔support, 用chrome…)
我心諗 ,我用firefox 3時, 你仲睇爆旋陀螺喇細佬.
我見你咁心急, desktop見到乜就用住先喇.
唔講我仲以為自己做junior programmer…

一直都沒有人跟我說話….無他既,一個三十幾歲既中年人, 竟然跟自己爭飯食.
起佢地心目中我係死人霸生地既死老鬼….自己不受歡迎…
到12:45pm時,我驚覺office好似冇乜人,,,原來12:30am已經放lunch….
沒人提我,沒有什麼welcome lunch…我出office時已經1:00pm…
唯有去附近7-11, 買一盒星洲炒米,,,一包維他奶….起7-11企起度食…
但求1:30pm前返到公司…..
又乾又韌既炒米, 每一啖放入口, 都有心如刀割….
虎落平阳被犬欺…每一口米粉, 都是我今早受的屈辱才有得食….
為生活…我可以忍…

十年前, 我讀CS Degree要求係AL 至少兩個A, 今日, 曉自己沖涼就讀得.

如果我當日不是做 IT, 而係做地產或金融業, 我而家不會起度出post.
我奉勸大家, 千奇不要做 IT.
你今天熱腔熱誠寫 Android 寫 IOS App, 咁十年後呢?
你有信心你一定夠運做到 Management grade 嗎?
還是同我一樣三十幾歲, 用腦過多,頭髮都開始地中海, 但仲要寫 code, 同時被新一代後生仔奚落?

甲子園有azure cert讀
我未諗緊mcse定azure

Q: If Microsoft is focused on role-based certifications, what will happen to Windows Server and SQL Server certifications? Will there be Windows Server 2019 and SQL Server 2019 certifications available?

A: No, there will not be Windows Server 2019 and SQL Server 2019 certifications. Windows Server 2019 and SQL Server 2019 content will be included in role-based certifications on an as-needed basis for certain job roles in the Azure Apps & Infrastructure and Data & AI solution areas.
